locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Puzzle HD
locale.subtitle: A Good PaintingTool
locale.description:
This is a children's interesting coloring software in the Pad. As a starting point from the child's interest in drawing enlightenment, provide an interesting and practical color painting tools for the children, let them create their own wonderful paintings, give full play to the children's imagination and creativity, and color painting feel fun.
The features of our products: Color with heart smear: easy operation, baby easy to hand. Free painting: in the world of lines and colors, the sky and the sky, and all the imagination. Save the paintings: keep the children's creative work. Rich line draft: more than 100 beautiful animal pictures. Custom color: directly select the color or direct input color RGB, so that the baby can choose any color. Unique color sucker: it is convenient and quick to choose the desired color in the direct painting. Automatic recognition of boundaries: let the children in the pattern painted not transcendence.
locale.promotional_text: Coloring cultivate children's painting skills and creativity

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝拼拼乐HD
locale.subtitle: 拼图学习应用
locale.description: 这是一款平板上特别为儿童设计的拼图游戏，它不仅能让您的孩子获得玩拼图游戏的趣味，更能提高您孩子对生活中事物的认知能力以及促进您孩子大脑的形象思维能力！本儿童拼图游戏是以生活中常见的物体(动物，交通工具，水果，蔬菜，花卉）为主题的拼图游戏故事，让宝宝在益智游戏里学习生活中的各种物体，眼，手，脑也一起得到锻炼，培养宝宝的综合能力。

keywords.keyword: 阳阳爱写字魔力小孩过年宝宝学写字中华恐龙园汉字与书法海绵宝宝做汉堡朵拉历险记学做饭宝宝爱洗澡三字经读写版宝宝书孕育跟我学写汉字蓝猫学拼音小嘀削削serato自由诵读经典儿歌巴巴熊巴巴宝贝熊孩子钢笔书法
